data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Zala, Hungary, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zala, Hungary
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Zala, Hungary by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 32 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Zala.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Zala, Hungary.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people know you.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Zala, Hungary that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Zala, Hungary to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Zala to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

location.name: Zala
location.people_groups_list: Chinese, general, Arab, general, Bosniak, Vietnamese, Turk
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chinese, general (6,400), Arab, general (5,200), Bosniak (19,000), Vietnamese (3,300), Turk (2,500)
